rooms.description: Spacious entrance leading into the living area with a modern Scandinavian design aesthetic
Open and airy living space with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and views. Features minimalist Scandinavian decor.
Adjacent to the living room, ideal for family meals. Designed in a modern yet functional style.
Fully equipped kitchen with Scandinavian simplicity and efficient layout. Vastu-aligned placement ensures positive energy flow.
Spacious balcony adjacent to one bedroom providing a view and relaxation space.
